page.title: 01BURNHAM OVERY HARBOUR
page.content: Burnham Overy Harbour and its immediate surrounds have recently (1983) been leased to the{Burnham {Overy Harbour Trust}by Lord Coke on behalf of the Holkham Estates. The principle aim of the Trust is to manage the Harbour area and adjacent marshes following the enviromental objectives of the Heritage Coastline, and to maintain and improve the Creeks and Harbour controlling and regulating the access to the Creeks for these objectives. The Management Committee of the Trust is comprised of representatives of the various groups in the area, parishioners, sailors, wildfowlers, fishermen, businesses, etc. and the Parish Council.
